column5: Hey guy I was up at hawk lake lodge guiding all summer and what a time we had the bass and eye fishing is out of this world!!!  http://www.hawk-lake.com  Here are some pics
It's the best life goin  lol
Oh, man! How did you get out of bed in the morning to go to work? Forced to fish every day - what a bummer. You probably had to eat fish all the time too, eh?
That lodge has been on my "to do" list for a while.   The fishing and food look amazing.
'FishLogic'  Come on up the food is good and the fishing is out of this world and the guide is one of the best you can get  " ME "  lol
